author: {'steamid': '76561198194680793', 'num_games_owned': 3045, 'num_reviews': 1947, 'playtime_forever': 178, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 178, 'last_played': 1698170545}
review:
Обычный платформер в котором всё по классике. Прыгаете по платформам, собираете монеты и исследуете миры. И можно было бы сказать, что это проходной играбельный продукт. Но нет. У игры серьёзные проблемы с оптимизацией. Вылет-стабильное дело. Да что там говорить. Игра вылетает даже при обязательном выборе разрешения при первом запуске. А ещё игра требует регистрации.
В общем, мусор не достойный вашего внимания. Запускать игру нет никаких причин, а уж покупать тем-более, так как нет ни достижений, ни коллекционных карточек. Играть же в это сомнительное удовольствие, учитывая стабильные вылеты.

author: {'steamid': '76561198013914001', 'num_games_owned': 1996, 'num_reviews': 919, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1690220630}
review:
Já nem jogo os jogos desse desenvolvedor.
O desenvolvedor tem diversos jogos de baixíssima qualidade.
Todos bem zoados e bugados. Acredito que ele usa templates prontos. Fácil achar jogos em flash gratuitos com mesmo tema e melhor implementação.
No lugar de aprimorar um jogo, ele lança um jogo ruim atrás do outro.

A aposta é que algum jogo vingue e o desenvolvedor possa lucrar sobre os 'achievement hunters'. Sim, gente que compra jogo lixo para ganhar achievements fáceis.
Ou talvez os jogos só servem como filler em bundles.
Só sei que para jogar não servem.

Não vamos deixar que lixo vingue. Desjoinha!

author: {'steamid': '76561198066346696', 'num_games_owned': 2239, 'num_reviews': 1253, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1674780506}
review:
Не нашёл отчётливых сведений о реальном годе выхода игры, но судя по официальному сайту это 2013. Вот только не верится, ввиду дикой простоты того, что я вижу на страничке Стима... ведь игру я так и не попробовал, ибо даже выставление настроек совместимости приводило к вылету. А раз уж так пренебрежительно отнеслись, к тому чтобы пропатчить платную игру, то оценка закономерна.
P.S.: на вид сразу становится понятно, что это клон Crash Bandicoot в 2,5D-измерении.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037839153', 'num_games_owned': 305, 'num_reviews': 297, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1609230537}
review:
[b]R.I.P. Tompi Jones[/b]
To już kolejne moje podejście do tej gry i ponownie zakończone fiaskiem. Za pierwszym razem (5 lat temu?) jedyne do czego dochodziło to czarny ekran na ok. 1 minutę a po tym zakończenie działania. Tym razem było lepiej. Pierw wybór języka a potem wybór rozdzielczości. Tu pierwsze zakończenie działania. Po ponownym uruchomieniu - już bez opcji - czekało na mnie okno: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2340127374
niestety to jest ostatnie co gra mi pokazała ponieważ za każdym ponownym uruchomieniem po wypełnieniu formularza dochodziło do wyrzucenia komunikatu o błędzie "Unable to set graphic mode". Żadne z proponowanych rozwiązań tego problemu, na jakie trafiłem, nic nie dało. Nadzieja na zobaczenie czym jest ten twór umarła. Ostatecznie?
Chyba tak ale jeżeli Ktoś miał podobny problem i zna rozwiązanie pozwalające zapoznać się z treścią tej gry to proszę o pomoc w komentarzach.

author: {'steamid': '76561198190642982', 'num_games_owned': 400, 'num_reviews': 170, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1524432627}
review:
"Tompi Jones" is a fun old style platform game in 2.5D where you will help Tompi across six worlds: the Aztec Pyramid, the Enchanted Forest, the Kingdom of Arkan, the Mysterious Jungle, the Dark Cemetery and the Fortress of Edom.

Tompi can walk, jump, roll on the ground, he can plan with the propeller he has in his hat, throw many types of projectile weapons, defend himself with a shield, fight with a sword, use a jetpack, climb the lianas, cling to ceilings, climb walls and jump between walls.

He can also use special items as stop the time, become invisible, super speed, enhance his projectile weapons or use the invulnerability.

Collect all the secret pieces and coins scattered throughout the levels to improve your skills, and to buy and improve your weapons and special items.

The game has an Online World Ranking. If you get enough coins you will be in the top 50!.

author: {'steamid': '76561198079135234', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1555168168}
review: Я зря потратил свои деньги на эту игру! Это же игра 2015 года! И то супер корова даже лучше графики хоть и вышла раньше Tompi Jones. Игра ужасная, ещё на русском языке нету этой игры и фиг поймёте это кнопка стрелять или выйти с игры! Не покупайте игру и вообще не тратьте на неё время. Оценка 0/10

author: {'steamid': '76561197998105505', 'num_games_owned': 5218, 'num_reviews': 68, 'playtime_forever': 14, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1553997913}
review:
During my 15min of playtime I had:
2 crashes
1 case of respawning on top of a deathtrap repeatedly, causing a death loop (this is a game with fixed checkpoints, there's no excuse for this)
1 case of managing to go outside the level
1 case of sounds "stacking" and repeating after a death, with each loop of the sound adding yet another instance of it, with a slight delay
1 case of the camera borking out, giving me a constant zoomed in view of my character, with the camera being placed slightly above him, pointing diagonally down (this is a side-scrolling platformer, why is this even happening?)

And also, to just put a cherry on top of this mess, the music does not loop properly, and the UI is awful. 

The sad part is that it feels like the developers were actually trying to make something good here, they put a fare bit of effort into some elements of it, by the looks of it. They just did not have the know-how to actually create what they set out to create.

author: {'steamid': '76561198271813242', 'num_games_owned': 91, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1509030168}
review:
[h1] Tompi Jones [/h1]
One of the [b]WORST[/b] games You might not even be able to play (seriously)

I Can't Even play this game Anymore ... I get an Error which promptly closes the game. However this game can be fun if played in short burst and long breaks inbetween... The game is VERY poorly optimised and does not support high res's 

this game does not Change ANYTHING in the genre nor does it even efficently preform some of the most basic platforming mechanics and becasue of this its novice mechanics and puzzles become VERY boring VERY fast.

This game was somewhat fun for the VERY little ammount of time i played it .

[B] PLEASE DO NOT BUY THIS GAME [/b] [i] Unless you are willing to sit through basic challanges ... and the chance the game might just stright up DIE  on you ... [/i] 

just Dont buy this game unless you're gifting it as a joke 

1/10 -Gwarby

author: {'steamid': '76561198094025596', 'num_games_owned': 1200, 'num_reviews': 446, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1498626456}
review:
Боюсь, единственное, что мне понравилось - это  глав. меню, забавно оформленное в виде настольной игры. Все остальное заставило сокрушенно качать головой.
♦ Визуальное оформление выглядит отталкивающе.
♦ Звуковые эффекты раздражают слух. Муз. cопровождение скудное.
♦ Технич. уровень исполнения неудовлетворительный.  При попытке изменить разрешение изображения программа просто  прекратила работу, сообщив об ошибке. Клавиши на клав-е, используемые для управления, нельзя переназначить. Подключить контроллер Canyon CNG-GP4 не удалось, игра не распознает это устройство ввода. Вызывает нарекание оптимизация - в нек-рых сценах кол-во кадров в секунду без видимых причин понижалось до 12.
♦ Примитивный, плохо продуманный  игр. проц. вызвал только отрицательные эмоции. 

Я не рекомендую приобретать Tompi Jones.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040147228', 'num_games_owned': 623, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1487796665}

author: {'steamid': '76561198030027926', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 441, 'playtime_forever': 20, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1487427021}
review:
Tompi is a fine example of a diamond in the rough - the two developers behind this game have added a lot more gameplay and exploration elements than most larger dev teams have over the past decade.

Secrets, collectibles, multiple gameplay mechanics; "AMBITIOUS" sums this game up nicely

But unfortunately Tompi met with a couple of highly aggrivating misfortunes along the way - namely lost data due to hard drive failure and a bundle site (now shut down) that refused to pay up for Tompi's participation.

I've just had a go since Desura and quite a bit has changed in the first level so I'm happy to see the game was cleaned up a bit more before it was deemed a closed case.

The developer assured me that, despite the bugs, all stages are finishable right up to end credits so I look forward to playing this game through to finish.

At the current retail I recommend this game to anyone wanting to support a small team of two who have tried desperatley hard and have churned out some highly intriguing game concepts (also see 'Match 3 Revolution') that perhaps might prove more lucrative if sold as concepts & prototypes to larger design houses.

author: {'steamid': '76561198233941008', 'num_games_owned': 2343, 'num_reviews': 2008, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1454279015}
review:
[h1]Tompi Jones: Uma Aventura Plataformista Divertida e Desafiadora[/h1]

Introdução:
"Tompi Jones" é uma pérola escondida no mundo dos jogos de plataforma, uma aventura que evoca a nostalgia dos clássicos enquanto oferece desafios modernos e emocionantes. Neste jogo, você assume o papel de Tompi Jones em uma jornada épica através de seis mundos distintos, cada um repleto de armadilhas mortais, inimigos astutos e tesouros ocultos.

Uma Viagem Através de Seis Mundos Únicos:
A jornada de Tompi leva você por uma ampla variedade de cenários, desde densas selvas até aldeias medievais encantadoras, pirâmides astecas e castelos sinistros. Cada mundo é ricamente detalhado e oferece seus próprios desafios, garantindo que você nunca fique entediado.

Armas, Espadas e Projéteis:
Para enfrentar os perigos que o aguardam, você terá à sua disposição uma variedade de armas e habilidades. Use sua espada para derrotar inimigos próximos ou atire com projéteis para alcançar os que estão longe. A escolha é sua, e a estratégia é essencial.

Desafios e Enigmas:
Além dos inimigos, "Tompi Jones" apresenta uma série de quebra-cabeças inteligentes que desafiarão sua mente e habilidades de plataforma. Você precisará pensar rapidamente e agir com precisão para superar esses obstáculos.

Recomendação:
"Tompi Jones" é uma aventura de plataforma que combina o melhor dos jogos clássicos com elementos modernos para criar uma experiência divertida e desafiadora. Se você é fã de jogos de plataforma que testam seus reflexos, resolução de quebra-cabeças e habilidades de combate, este jogo é altamente recomendado. Sua atmosfera encantadora e mundos variados o tornam adequado para jogadores de todas as idades. Prepare-se para uma jornada emocionante com Tompi Jones enquanto ele enfrenta inimigos, desvenda mistérios e coleta tesouros em busca da aventura definitiva.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024446834', 'num_games_owned': 2575, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 9, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1480244444}
review:
Best game i ever played. Each time i run the exe he does something different, can't set resolution but in fact he work a the right resolution, lot memory acces violation but it run the game xD. Only keybord play for hardcore gamer. Graphics from ps1 generation are astonishing. The music is so epic (for once this is real, music is really epic).

Can't really say what the hero are made, look like a tomato with human hand, so distrubing, i've nightmare since the day i play Tompi Jones.

This game is better than a quarter of ps1 full set :P. If you have this game in your library, try it once ! it's so good !

review:
4,5/10 
Gra nie jest jakaś wyróżniająca się jednak zła też nie.
Brakuje mi w niej jakiejś przyzwoitej sterowności ,oraz bardzo irytujące (jak z resztą w podobnych grach również) fakt że po śmierci (która mi zdarzała się co chwilę) trafiamy do checkpointa ale mamy ograniczoną ilość ów żyć. Jeżeli ktoś chce zadać sobie trud i przechodzić całą tą grę to gratuluję jednak mnie na to nie stać czasowo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047177696', 'num_games_owned': 614, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1449410953}
review:
Este jogo é vergonhosamente ruim.
Sinceramente, parece um trabalho de algum curso de games que fizeram "só pra passar" e depois resolveram publicar na Steam.
A mecânica é ruim, a musica é enjoativa, a física é horrível e os controles, piores

Parabenizo os desenvolvedores por terem passado no curso.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061742924', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1470319559}
review:
I'm sorry, I don't usually write reviews, but this is another game I need to rant about....memory access violation through all three tutorials....can't skip them either even if I wanted to to get to the real stages.....

This game must not be laptop friendly..... or doesn't like mine at least, for some reason. Here, check this [url=http://steamcommunity.com/app/370310/discussions/0/365163686051365347/]thread[/url] out, I posted on there and never heard back.....from the devs or anyone else with a similar probem like me....yes, I actually patiently waited for a reply thinking maybe, ok I'll give them some time to get back to me, perhaps they're busy now and might reply back in at most a week's time, four months later - no replies; so either the devs are too busy to bother helping me out or this was just cash grab and nothing more...

Waste of my time and money....why did I even bother with this piece of crap.....

author: {'steamid': '76561198079355313', 'num_games_owned': 226, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1026, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1026, 'last_played': 1475818161}
review: After playing this game through a couple times, it's safe to say that Tompi Jones by DreamsSoftGames is truly a masterpiece of a game. The game has great graphics and very smooth controls. Everything responds right away and I had no problem completing the game without any techinical difficulties.This game doesn't have much of a story, however the unique stages and abilities Tompi can use makes up for it. Furthermore, the game is slightly challenging at times, which is good for people like me who loves problem solving. Like Donkey Kong, I believe Tompi Jones can be a 2-d platformer that could stand the test of time. I give Tompi Jones a solid 9/10 give it a try someday as it's worth your money and time. Hopefully, an HD remake could come out and It would make me and a lot of other people a happy camper.

author: {'steamid': '76561198272374716', 'num_games_owned': 13029, 'num_reviews': 3562, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1463793117}
review:
Игра звезд с неба не хватает, но и не отталкивает. Обычный платформер. 
Играем за M&M'sоподобное существо. Герой может бегать, прыгать, перекатываться, парить (благодаря своей шляпе с пропеллером) и летать (если подобрать джетпак). 
Управление простое. Графика угловатая, но терпимая. Можно рекомендовать детям.

review:
おすすめ率20%を切るゲームなんでわくわくしながら起動してみたら普通だった
一応アクションゲームの体はなしています
残機がなくなってもセーブポイントからやり直せるのは評価できる
ただ解像度が荒いので今時のゲームと比べると確実に見劣りしてしまう
昔なつかしのゲームをやる感じでとらえれば遊べないことはない
あまり期待しすぎないように

author: {'steamid': '76561198247342476', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 12, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1459387680}
review:
Bueno, no es por ser duro... Pero que juego tan de la puta mierda.
No soy una persona que tienda a juzgar un juego por sus gráficos, de hecho es a lo que menor importancia presto, así que por esa parte lo dejaré pasar para ser bueno.

Trompi Jones es un juego cutre que ni siquiera te da la posibilidad de pasar del tutorial, ya que sale un letrero que no te deja mover ni hacer click, ni pausar para darle a "salir". Como me fue imposible jugar pues no puedo decir nada de la jugabilidad o la historia (si es que la tiene). Y bueno, pues que se puede esperar de un juego que no deja pasar del tutorial, pues bueno, no creo que las espectativas sean muy grandes, así que lo mejor que pude hacer fue desinstalarlo.

Tampoco se deja cerrar con "alt+f4", así que el juego debe ser algún tipo de karma por alguna mal acción en mi vida pasada.

En resumen: Ni siquiera te deja salir -000000000000000,4/10

review: Unfortunately, I could not play the game at all, as with all 4 resolutions (none of which were 1920x1080), the game would go to an account creation screen, which would not only not allow me to create a username, but also immediately crashed afterwards, telling me it was unable to set the graphics mode.  I tried on all four resolutions available, and to no avail.  Don't waste your time with this game, if the developer is unable/unwilling to fix it so it is at least playable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031313794', 'num_games_owned': 8531, 'num_reviews': 3393, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1451040040}
review:
[h1]Описание:[/h1]
Обычный платформер в котором надо прыгать, стрелять, собирать монетки и так на протяжении нескольких миров.

[h1]Плюсы:[/h1]
¥ Нет достижений (спасибо разработчикам за это, я бы не смог заставить себя в ней получать ачивки)

[h1]Минусы:[/h1]
¥ Убогая графика.
¥ Убогая музыка.
¥ Отстутсвие какой либо оптимизации.
¥ Нет поддержки контроллера.
¥ Неудобное управление.
¥ Нет русского языка.

[h1]Итог:[/h1]
Разработчики сделали игру непонятно для кого... Видно, что в нее вложено много труда, уровни просторные и их много. В игре несколько миров... Но зачем это нужно? Игра не блещет картинкой, но лагует так, как будто мы играем в свежую новинку. Управление мышкой и клавиатурой и без поддержки контроллера. Если бы в игре было 10 уровней, я бы прошел и даже возможно поставил положительную оценку как инди начинанию, но тут множество уровней играть и проходить которые не хочется. Крайне не рекомендую эту игру и мне очень жалко разработчиков которые потратили столько сил в пустоту.

[h1]Оценка: 2/10[/h1]

[h1]Послесловие:[/h1]
Если вам понравился этот обзор добро пожаловать в группу
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/uojer - тут вы сможете увидеть рекомендованные мною игры, другие обзоры, а также просто пообщаться в хорошей компании.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985969658', 'num_games_owned': 1012, 'num_reviews': 690, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 15, 'last_played': 1441872509}
review:
3/10. 

If this game didn't exist the world would be a better place. It's a platformer that fails at every part of platforming. The same annoying song plays throughout the whole game. Trying to use a gamepad doesn't work because your guy just continually runs forward. Using keyboard/mouse, controls are terrible, with L mouse jumping, even though it says space does it. Only 2 preset config, can't set your own. The levels are boring, bland, and uninteresting. The graphics are terrible, not in a retro or pixel way, but in a blocky ugly poopy way. The actual platforming mechanics are terrible. The jump super inaccurately and floaty like. Your wall jumps are incontrollable. When you try and use the jetpack you  lag down quickly but only ascend slowly, and its hard to control. The combat is just you spamming attack to throw knives, but it doesn't really work. You can only throw straight forward but there are enemies that attack you from above and below meaning you get hurt a lot. There are a certain number of lives, and then continues. If you want to buy more the has a shop that links to their website.....because this is F2P now or what?
 
Look everywhere and anywhere else besides this game to fulfill your platforming needs. The $2 price tag is way too rich, 20 cents sounds more reasonable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198103090723', 'num_games_owned': 3001, 'num_reviews': 344, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1439092489}
review:
First off I should apologize for not playing at least 2-3 hours on the game before reviewing.  30 min (or so) in and I've got to make dinner.  That said the last 29 min (or so) has been frustrating.

Good:
In bundles
Low system specs needed
May get steam cards (not as August 8th 2015)
Dev is (was) very helpful

Con:
Graphic options
Controls are not percise enough for us old guys / non-super twitch level gamers
Price (4.49 CDN) - wait to get this in a bundle
Graphics

Overall:
5/10 -2 controls -1 graphics -1 price +2 Dev = 3/10 (4/10 if in a bundle)

So yet another thumbs sideways game.  I'm not into scrollers, so that may be affecting my decision.  I'm OK with crappy graphics if the game is fun.  I'm not OK with crappy controls and I just cannot get the hang of the controls with enough percision to have fun.

If I come back to this game and they have improved the controls then I will re-review ... as I do want to like the game.  For now, I'm just frustrated.  Not fun = Thumbs down.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037063744', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 355, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 355, 'last_played': 1438713099}
review:
This game should be free to play... Not just once, but about once in every level I found myself falling through the ground. Once I got stuck inside a wall and unable to get loose.. and the graphics? Sure I understand if the developer is going for that ps1 platformer feel but fix these damn bugs or set it to f2p. Its not very nice to make people pay 3,99 for something that's just about unplayable. Also found it funny how the aztecs owned euros... run out of ideas for the coin design? Not recommending this. Maybe when the dev decides to fix these bugs where you fall through solid ground and glitch stuck but else? Nope.
EDIT: It's just been confirmed this game can't even be completed. I get to world 2 level 4, the game shuts down and gives me an error messages about a memory violation. My pc memory is just fine so its the game. And I can't get past this level cause it happens every time I start this one. DON'T BUY.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091098497', 'num_games_owned': 6231, 'num_reviews': 390, 'playtime_forever': 32, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1698833762}
review:
Why is this game still up for sale on the store?

The servers for this game seem to be dead, I get a connection error on the registration screen.
I also can not even enter into a level, I get an error message: 'Unable to set graphics mode' on a 3060.

Avoid this and save your money for something that works,

author: {'steamid': '76561197990947284', 'num_games_owned': 5370, 'num_reviews': 1356, 'playtime_forever': 8, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 8, 'last_played': 1433065029}
review:
I tried to find a positive aspect about this game but failed, so here's why you shouldn't even consider purchasing this game:

- Bad graphics and effects
- Horrible controls
- Long loading times paired with confusing menus
- No 1080p resolution setting
- Glitchy traps
- Overwhelmingly annoying music and sfx
